description:
Kariya and the others successfully open the Seireimon using the mobs from Kusajishi. Upon entering, they attack not only the Soul Reaper guards, but the mobs as well—and confusion reigns. Ichigo and the others leave Orihime to take care of the injured gate guards and enter the Seireitei. In the Seireitei, the captains hold an officers` meeting to discuss what action they will take. Meanwhile, the Bount Mabashi enters the Seireitei and attacks the Soul Reapers using Ritze.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami contre Shinigami ! Une puissance écrasante
Shinigami vs. Shinigami! The Uncontrollable Power
死神VS死神! 暴走する力
